FUNCTION generate_string() RESULT(s)
    CHARACTER(LEN=2893) :: s
    CHARACTER(LEN=4) :: temp
    INTEGER :: i, pos, current_length

    s = ' '
    pos = 1
    DO i = 1, 1000
        WRITE(temp, '(I4)') i
        temp = ADJUSTL(temp)
        current_length = LEN_TRIM(temp)
        s(pos: pos + current_length - 1) = temp(1: current_length)
        pos = pos + current_length
    END DO
END FUNCTION generate_string

program codeforces_672a
    implicit none
    integer :: n
    character(len=2893) :: s

    read *, n
    s = generate_string()
    print *, s(n:n)
end program codeforces_672a

FUNCTION generate_string() RESULT(s)
    CHARACTER(LEN=2893) :: s
    CHARACTER(LEN=4) :: temp, temp_adj
    INTEGER :: i, pos, current_length

    s = ' ' pos = 1 DO i = 1, 1000
        WRITE(temp, '(I4)') i
        temp_adj = ADJUSTL(temp)
        current_length = LEN_TRIM(temp_adj)
        s(pos:pos + current_length -1) = temp_adj(1:current_length)
        pos = pos + current_length
    END DO
END FUNCTION generate_string

program codeforces_672a
    implicit none
    integer :: n
    character(len=2893) :: s

    read *, n
    s = generate_string()
    print *, trim(adjustl(s(n:n)))
    !

FUNCTION generate_string() RESULT(s)
    CHARACTER(LEN=2893) :: s
    CHARACTER(LEN=4) :: temp, temp_adj
    INTEGER :: i, pos, current_length

    s = ' '
    pos = 1
    DO i = 1, 1000
        WRITE(temp, '(I4)') i
        temp_adj = ADJUSTL(temp)
        current_length = LEN_TRIM(temp_adj)
        s(pos:pos + current_length -1) = temp_adj(1:current_length)
        pos = pos + current_length
    END DO
END FUNCTION generate_string

    read *, n
    s = generate_string()
    print *, trim(adjustl(s(n:n)))
    ! alternatively, just print *, s(n:n)

end program codeforces_672a

FUNCTION generate_string() RESULT(s)
    CHARACTER(LEN=2893) :: s
    CHARACTER(LEN=4) :: temp
    INTEGER :: i, pos, current_length

    s = ' '
    pos = 1
    DO i = 1, 1000
        WRITE(temp, '(I4)') i
        temp = ADJUSTL(temp)
        current_length = LEN_TRIM(temp)
        s(pos: pos + current_length - 1) = temp(1: current_length)
        pos = pos + current_length
    END DO
END FUNCTION generate_string

    s = generate_string()
